metadata.name: Stake for Nature
metadata.description: Collaborating with Cardano project for making our planet a better place. Delegate in Stake for Nature and you will be helping us to take care of the planet.

metadata.name: ESGpool
metadata.description: 100% of our margin profits are donated to Environmental and Social causes. Namely supporting local bat care and rehabilitation.

metadata.name: ADABLUE Stake Pool
metadata.description: A Cardano Stake Pool – Not Just Any Stake Pool. A Vision, A Reality, The Future

metadata.name: CloudStruct Cardano Staking
metadata.description: Highly-available, secure cloud-based pool with multiple relays, managed by cloud infrastructure specialists - Contributing to and supporting Cardano ecosystem open source development.

metadata.name: ADA4 SOIL
metadata.description: When staking with SOIL you are rewarded with ADA for running & securing Cardano, while rejuvenating the world's top soils & ecosystems! SOIL donates: 25% of profits to the Savory Institute + 5% to Veritree

metadata.name: The Dodo Pool
metadata.description: Swiss Stake Pool Operator wants to give delegates the power to decide which humanitarian cause to support. By partnering with non-profit organizations that are focused on children education, fighting injustice, ending poverty and preserving human dignity.

metadata.name: Happy Raspberry ❤️
metadata.description: Passionate IT enthusiast, looking forward to all the opportunities for Technologies to improve peoples lives, like Cardano. Raspberry Pi's, 99,9% up-time, on-premise, whole household is powered by renewable energy, Czech Republic, 10% planting trees.

metadata.name: CardanoBits Stake Pool
metadata.description: Stake with us to support the CardanoBits Community and for regular airdrops! Join our discord server: https://discord.gg/prKRY8ZTtn

metadata.name: Single Stake
metadata.description: SSPO is a veteran-owned, lowest-cost, mission-driven pool that prioritizes decentralization over wealth creation. Our interests are that of our delegators, charity, and providing peak performance via hybrid-cloud and bare-metal relays.

metadata.name: GELDTIGER
metadata.description: Support of the Cardano EcoSystem. Operated from Austria - hosted in the EU.

metadata.name: Mamba Pool
metadata.description: ¡Bienvenido a Mamba Pool! Participe en este maravilloso proyecto, en el cual nos comprometemos a proporcionar servicios de staking de alta calidad mediante fiabilidad, honestidad y rendimiento de clase empresarial. ¡Feliz staking!

metadata.name: Poolarized
metadata.description: Our reliable & trustworthy staking pool from Portugal

metadata.name: Charity Lounge
metadata.description: Charity Stake Pool | 0% Margin | 30% Donations of Pool Rewards (fixed fees) | Stake with us - BIG returns for you and ppl in NEED

metadata.name: Alice Stake Pool
metadata.description: Single stake pool operator w/ 100% uptime. Come down the rabbit hole with us!

metadata.name: X Mexico Stake Pool
metadata.description: De México para el mundo. Somos XMEX, una pool que busca ayudar a la descentralización de Cardano y apoyar a los más necesitados. Cada mes donaremos 15% de nuestras ganancias a caridades en México. ¿Te gustaría ayudar? haz stake con nosotros XMEX!

metadata.name: Marjun's Cardano Friends Pool
metadata.description: MARJUN Friends and Family Stake Pool helping the Cardano decentralization!
